lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Angels have signed the right-hander Ervin Santana to a four-year deal through 2012. Santana, 26, is the youngest active pitcher with at least 50 victories. He rebounded from a subpar season in 2007 to go 16-7 with a 3.49 earned run average.
